name: Lumière (Orihaus)
description:
Minimal exploration game built in 2 days for Ludum Dare 26, April 2013.
There are no enemies, no puzzles, no obstacles; just you and the endless megastructure.

Note: WASD and mouselook to move. R respawns. Immediate spawn area causes occasional lag issues, the rest of the game should work fine.

Ludum Dare completion page here. First place in graphics, thanks a ton for voting!
